name: Crafty Shield
effect: Reaction. Shield Move. The User and its Allies are protected from the effects of a Support Move. The opposing Pokemon that triggered crafty shield receives +1 minimum damage until end of round, to a minimum of 1. (This effect supersedes ineffectiveness and any other augmentations to minimum damage. This effect does not impact the base damage that the pokemon receives)
description: The Pokemon creates a magic shield to protect everyone from the bad tricks a foe might have under its sleeve. Under this shield, everyone can see dishonesty and bad intentions.
